unnormalised: Arrey yaar, Delhi khatir havaman bhashaan korunk sangta ki 15/05/2024-ak 42 deg C ashtaa! Ani te sangtat ki heat wave 20/05 poriant chalu asteli. Mhaje AC-n mhaka dhokho diunk favona. 25 Mai thaun 30 Mai poriant Shimla-k bhet diunk yevjitant assa. Asha assa thondd asteli thoim, bhashaan korunk sangtat 25Â°C laginch, kiteak tor 27/05-ak thoddea pavasan sarki. Aangdde dhurun dovorleat!
normalised: Arrey yaar, Delhi khatir havaman andaz sangta ki pandhra may don hazar chovisak bayalis degree celsius astaa! Ani te sangtat ki ushnachi lahar vis may meren choltel. Mhojem A-C mat soddunk favona. Ponchis may thavn tees may meren Shimlak bhett divpak yevzon karta. Umed asta ki thoim thondd astaa, andaz sangta ki sumar ponchis degree celsius, kosli tori pavsacho shiraddo satois mayak astaa. Botam addun dhorleant!
